feed.title: The Machine Learning for Socio-Technical Systems Lab at University of Rhode Island

entry.title: Dr. Brown will be at NSBE Gold
entry.content: She will teach a full day Python training as well as host an AI Mythbusting Workshop
entry.summary: She will teach a full day Python training as well as host an AI Mythbusting Workshop

entry.title: NSF CAREER Award!
entry.content: Dr. Brown recevied an NSF CAREER Award for her proposal titled, “CAREER: Realizing Sociotechnical Machine Learning through Modeling, Explanations, and Reflections.”
entry.summary: Dr. Brown recevied an NSF CAREER Award for her proposal titled, “CAREER: Realizing Sociotechnical Machine Learning through Modeling, Explanations, and Reflections.”

entry.title: Summer Scholars Join the Lab
entry.content:
Document headings start at H2, not H1 [myst.header]

We’re excited to welcome our summer scholars who have joined the lab for the summer. They’ll be working on various projects related to machine learning for socio-technical systems.
entry.summary: Document headings start at H2, not H1 [myst.header]We’re excited to welcome our summer scholars who have joined the lab for the summer. They’ll be working on various projects related to machine learning for socio-technical systems.

entry.title: ORCA-CAP Funding for Open Humanities
entry.content: In Collaboration with Madison Jones and Jeremiah Dyehouse we recieved an award from the Open Research Community Accelerator Catalytic Awards Program to build a reusable open source curriculum and hold a workshop for humanties scholars on the basics of open source. Our goal is to help humanities scholars embrace digitial methods without being locked into expensive, corporate controlled platforms.
entry.summary: In Collaboration with Madison Jones and Jeremiah Dyehouse we recieved an award from the Open Research Community Accelerator Catalytic Awards Program to build a reusable open source curriculum and hold a workshop for humanties scholars on the basics of open source. Our goal is to help humanities scholars embrace digitial methods without being locked into expensive, corporate controlled platforms.

entry.title: Surbhi Rathore achieved ABD (All-But-Dissertation) status in her PhD program.
entry.content: Surbhi has successfully passed her dissertation proposal defense and achieved ABD (All-But-Dissertation) status in her PhD program.
entry.summary: Surbhi has successfully passed her dissertation proposal defense and achieved ABD (All-But-Dissertation) status in her PhD program.
